_description: A prayer of penitence — one 6-line stanza in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines: Lord Iesu þin oreI sorwe & sike sore …
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…with sennes lesse & moreAllas allas þe
                    stound
NLS18721.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 346.
